plot: Sean writes a love letter to his ex-girlfriend, hoping to get her back, so that he may find the inspiration he needs to finish his novel.
title: Modern Day Love Letter
plot_es: Sean writes a love letter to his ex-girlfriend, hoping to get her back, so that he may find the inspiration he needs to finish his novel.
plot_en: Sean writes a love letter to his ex-girlfriend, hoping to get her back, so that he may find the inspiration he needs to finish his novel.
